title: Tomb Raider Definitive
description: Tomb Raider explores the intense and gritty origin story of Lara Croft and her ascent from a young woman to a hardened survivor. Armed only with raw instincts and the ability to push beyond the limits of human endurance, Lara must fight to unravel the dark history of a forgotten island to escape its relentless hold. Download the Turning Point trailer to see the beginning of Lara’s epic adventure. Star Trucker

system_requirements.OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3, Windows Vista,7,8 (32bit/64bit)
system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core 2 DUO 2.4 GHz / AMD Athlon X2 2.7 GHz
system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 Ti or AMD HD 7850

game_info.Developer: Crystal Dynamics, Eidos-Montréal, Feral Interactive (Mac), Nixxes
